title: White hot chocolate
description: White Hot Chocolate is a rich and creamy decadent drink that melts in your mouth with a smooth, sweet white chocolate and vanilla flavoring. Warm up with this white hot chocolate during the holiday season! Warm drinks make winter season even better.

title: Classic hot chocolate
description: Steamed milk and mocha sauce topped with sweetened whipped cream and a chocolate-flavoured drizzle.

title: Salted caramel hot chocolate
description: Milk, dark chocolate and salted caramel sauce are simmered together with a blend of rich, warming spices in this luxurious hot chocolate.

title: Green tea
description: Rich in antioxidants and reduces inflammation.

title: Balck tea
description: Boosts heart health and lowers cholesterol.

title: Chamomile tea
description: Lowers blood sugar and prevents osteoporosis.

title: Berry tea
description: Supports cardiovascular health by helping to lower cholestrol levels, reduce blood pressure and decrease the risk of heart attack and stroke.
